titleStmt.title: Doctor Merrie-man, or, Nothing but mirth written by S.R.
titleStmt.author: Rowlands, Samuel, 1570?-1630?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Iohn Deane, and are to be sold at his shoppe at Temple-barre vnder the gate,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Rowlands by STC (2nd ed.) and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
"First edition was printed in 1607, under the title of D̀emocritus, or Dr. Merry-man, his medicines against melancholy humours'"--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.

place.placeName: his shoppe at Temple-barre vnder the gate
